These CD4+CD161+ T-cells are known to be either IL-17 producer cells or their precursors<|other_cit|>. Thus, our results could reflect the re-circulation of these cells from the lung or secondary lymphoid organs after infection and support the possibility of IL-17 in mediating neutrophil damage to the lungs.
